price: ߡߐ߬ߟߐ߲߬ ߠߎ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߓߍ߯ ߟߴߊ߬ ߓߊ߯ߙߊ߫ ߣߐ ߘߐ߫ ߸ ߌ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߘߏ߲߬ ߖߊ߲߬ߓߐߣߍ߲߫ ߕߍ߫ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߗߋߥߊߟߌ ߟߎ߬ ߘߐ߫
arabic: وَلِكُلّٖ دَرَجَٰتٞ مِّمَّا عَمِلُواْۚ وَمَا رَبُّكَ بِغَٰفِلٍ عَمَّا يَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: walikullin darajātun mimmā ʿamilū wamā rabbuka bighāfilin ʿammā yaʿmalūna
